name: Shooter's Sac (Digital Download)
description: This is a downloadable .zip file containing the time-limited downloads that were posted to the I Shoot Blog in 2012 as well as a number of additional items. Please note that not all items are pictured in the listing here. Since this shop does not primarily contain digital downloads, it is not set up to provide automatic download. However, you should receive an email with the download link within 24hrs of your payment. Items in Shooter's Sac include: - 5 Actions. I Shoot Shooter's Sac Photoshop Action Set (SlightlyBright, SkinFix, Sharp, Up the Shadows, Convert to sRGB). - 1 Birth Announcement Template (.psd layered file) - 1 Snowflake Card Template (.psd layered file) - 6 Storyboards / Blog Templates (.psd layered files) - 5 Textures (Dirty Blue, Silver, Golden Thread, Dreamy Grey, Rouge) Files are provided "as is" and I Shoot does not guarantee availabilty to provide technical assistance. There is some instruction in previous blog posts on the Blog that you may refer to. Due to the digital nature of this product, all sales are final. This is industry standard for digital products. Add Shooter's Sac to any order for only $15. Use code ADDSAC15 * *One discount code per purchase. Please note that I will not be able to honor codes that are not applicable to your order, even if the computer allows you to use the code during your checkout. If you enter a discount code that is not applicable to your order and the discount is still applied during checkout, you will be sent a second invoice to pay the balance of the correct amount plus $1.00.

name: I Shoot PEOPLE (Ladies Tee)
description: You asked, and I Shoot delivered! The "I Shoot People" design is now available in a slim cut ladies tee, and in colors other than black! Available in Hot Pink, Light Blue and Black. Don't like neck tags? These feature a "tear-away" tag - easy to tear off, no cutting or remnants of tag left behind! (Note: if you choose to tear off the tag, you will be removing the size, care instructions and other information that is on the tag) 100% Ringspun Cotton. Super-soft with a slight stretch. This is a ladies slim cut tee with a longer body length and shorter sleeves. NOTE that this style of shirt is a smaller make, so you will need to order 2 sizes larger your usual shirt size. For this reason, the slim cut ladies tees are only available in size L, XL and 2XL which will generally fit ladies who usually wear size S, M and L. See FAQ for more sizing information. $5 off a T-shirt when added to a Cap order! Use discount code ADDT5 * 50% OFF Wristbands when ordered with something else. Use code WBSAVE50 * *One discount code per purchase. Please note that I will not be able to honor codes that are not applicable to your order, even if the computer allows you to use the code during your checkout. If you enter a discount code that is not applicable to your order and the discount is still applied during checkout, you will be sent a second invoice to pay the balance of the correct amount plus $1.00.

Tell the world what YOU shoot with the I Shoot line of tees. This unisex t-shirt is now available in black and blue! 100% Combed Ringspun Cotton. Super-soft and lightweight. Machine washable and preshrunk to minimize shrinkage. See FAQ for more sizing information. Don't like neck tags? These feature a "tear-away" tag - easy to tear off, no cutting or remnants of tag left behind! name: Bag Tag - I Shoot RAW
description:
This unique, shimmery bag tag is awesome!  To be honest, the picture doesn't do justice to how nice this tag actually is! This is a virtually indestructible steel tag measuring 2.5x4.25”.  The design is fade and scratch resistant. It comes with a black vinyl loop to attach to your luggage or camera bag.  Fill in your information on the back and seal it with the provided clear adhesive cover.  You’ll be able to easily spot your luggage while other travellers will see that YOU SHOOT RAW!!

name: Photographer Cap (bamboo) - Camera RAW
description: This is the Flexfit bamboo cap in black (59% bamboo, 38% cotton, 3% spandex). It's a 6 panel, low-profile, structured cap with a 3 1/4 inch crown. Moisture wicking fabric with anti-bacterial and UV protection. The design is embroidered. Sizes: S/M (6 3/4" - 7 1/4"), L/XL (7 1/8" - 7 5/8") Caps are shipped in a box so they don't get crushed. NOTE: Shipping for this item is much more expensive within Canada than to the USA (crazy, I know!). If you want this shipped to a Canadian address, you MUST choose Canada from the drop down box. name: Bag Tag / Keychain - I Shoot RAW
description:
This is a virtually indestructible metal tag measuring 2 1/8” round.  The shimmery design is printed on both sides, and is fade and scratch resistant. To be honest, the picture doesn’t do justice to how nice this tag actually is!  The key ring is fabricated of spring-tempered steel which is then plated in bright zinc or nickel to prevent corrosion.  The key ring opens easily yet resumes its original shape without distortion, and easily attaches to luggage and keys. Tell the world YOU SHOOT RAW by tagging your bag and/or your keys!!

name: $50 Credit to I Shoot AND Online Photoshop Workshop
description: Here's a little clip from the workshop. This video is small, but the actual workshop is 1280x720 HD. Preview - Photoshop Workshop If you're interested in this product, please read ALL the information below! Intro to Photoshop is an online video workshop! Learn at your own pace, from the comfort of your own home, anywhere around the world. Heck, you could even be in your PJs watching the workshop at 11pm! This is 3 hours of instruction, but it will take approximately 6 hours to complete the workshop because you will need to pause and practice using Photoshop on your computer throughout the video. You can choose the day you would like to do the workshop, so register whenever is good for you! Do you have Photoshop but are so overwhelmed with all the buttons and tools that you don’t know where to start? Or, does the idea of using Photoshop to enhance your images intrigue you, but you’ve never taken the leap to try it out? Either way, this workshop is for you! General computer knowledge is necessary, but no knowledge about using Photoshop is required. Some of the topics covered: menus, tools, layers and masks, adjusting colors and converting to black & white, creating composite images and more. Participants should have Photoshop (CS3/CS4/CS5/CS6) installed and working prior to the workshop. You can download a 30 day trial for free at www.adobe.com (You may want to wait until shortly before you register for the workshop to download the trial so you will still have time to practice what you’ve learned after the workshop, before the trial expires). CS5 will be used to demonstrate, but things will be very similar in other versions. If you have Photoshop Elements, you will be able to transfer your new knowledge to using that program as well, but the layout and buttons will be slightly different. Since you can pause and playback the workshop, you'll have time to find corresponding menus and tools in the version of the program you have and then re-watch sections of the workshop to clarify. You will receive a link to the HD video, and a password to gain access to view it. Your password is valid for 1 day, during which time you can watch the workshop as many times as you'd like. The regular workshop registration is $59. For only $1 more you get a $50 credit to I Shoot to use towards a purchase! Or, you can think of it as purchasing a $50 credit to I Shoot and getting access to the workshop for only $10. Either way, it's a great deal! After you register by paying the registration fee below, please email me using the contact form on the website to schedule the day you would like to do the workshop - please specify 2 days that will work for you, in case one day is not available for some reason. Please register at least 2 days before the day you would like to gain access, to allow enough time for us to arrange your viewing. You will receive an email with the workshop information, link and password late the night before the day you register for. You will receive the $50 credit code in the email with your password; it will be valid for 1 month and can be used towards any purchase greater than $50. Due to the nature of this workshop, there are no refunds or password extensions for any reason, including program or technical difficulties (for example, you get error messages with your version of Photoshop, or your computer crashes), a change in your schedule, or unforeseen circumstances. This is industry standard for digital products. Thank you for understanding. When you purchase access to the Intro to Photoshop workshop you are purchasing a non-transferable, non-exclusive right to access the video. You may not publish or share the video or your password with anyone else. All advice is provided "as is" with no warranties or indemnities as to its appropriateness for your particular situation. I am not able to provide technical support/assistance. By registering, you are agreeing to the payment terms.

name: I Shoot RAW Wristband (Irregular)
description: These wristbands were "weeded out" during my quality check. They are irregular - for example, they may have a "less than perfect" cut or a small mark on them. The irregularities are only noticable when viewing closely, and generally wouldn't be noticed by others when the band is on your wrist. Other information about the regular bands (size, etc) applies to these. They are packaged differently than the full price bands. Available while quantities last. Final sale. These are priced to be added to your order. They ship for FREE (in Canada) when added to an order; if ordered alone, there is a small shipping charge.
